description: Expected results for basic inventory sync flow test

expected_messages.description: Start message should be sent successfully
Data message should be sent successfully
End message should be sent successfully

validation_rules.session_consistency: All messages should use the same session ID
validation_rules.message_order: Messages should be sent in the correct order: start -> data -> end
validation_rules.response_format: Each message should receive a proper response or no response for data messages
